com.djammr.westernknights.util.loaders

Class Overlap2DLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.djammr.westernknights.util.loaders.Overlap2DLoader

  • public class Overlap2DLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Loads maps and UIs from an Overlap2D project

    Features:
    • Texture loading
    • Loading of non-universal Components from a 'components' array custom variable e.g. [AComponent, ExampleComponent]
    • Loading of Box2D Meshes created in Overlap2D

           EntityManager entityManager)
        Loads an Overlap2D Scene, creating the entities and adding them to the EntityManager
        Parameters:
        projectPath - FileHandle for Overlap2D project file
        scenePath - FileHandle for Overlap2D scene file to load
        atlas - path to Overlap2D project texture atlas
        entityManager - EntityManager instance to add entities to

        Loads Box2D Mesh data for a SimpleImageVO from an Overlap2D Project
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        created MeshData object
